title: In Charm's Way
description: No release date yet, it might not be released at allBaker & Taylor: After a real corpse is discovered among the decorations at a Halloween display, Stony Mill Indiana's own witch, Maggie O'Neill, must help prove a friend's innocence in the latest mystery in the best-selling series following Home for a Spell. Penguin Putnam: A brand new Bewitching mystery that will leave readers spellbound. When a real corpse is discovered among the props of a Halloween haunted house, Maggie O'Neill- resident witch of Stony Mill, Indiana- must use her charms to prove her friend innocent of the crime and get to the bottom of the mystery.
author: Madelyn Alt
